QuestData.Title: Fall of the King
QuestData.Description: All that remains is the Sea Giant King.$B$BPlace our banner upon his beach and draw him out of the sea. Once he has revealed himself, use the trident to wound him.$B$BThere is a derelict boat that washed up on the shore. Use that to quickly get to the king's island.$B$BGird your loins, $n. This fight will not be easy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Jandvik Banner on the Sea Giant King's island to draw him out and defeat him.
